record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - June 03, 2008)

[Page: S4982]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Kellen McAnulty, an intern in my office, be granted floor privileges for the remainder of this work period.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Sara Sanders of my staff be granted the privilege of the floor.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Mr. Duncan Hill of my staff be allowed floor privileges for the remainder of this debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Sophie Trads from my staff be granted floor privileges for the duration of my remarks.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent, on behalf of Senator Cardin, that Michael Morgan, a fellow from his office, be granted the privilege of the floor for the duration of the debate on S. 3036.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
